post.text: Hillary Clinton is CORRUPT! Crooked only cares about power, money and herself. I am in this for YOU! #AmericaFirst

comment.author: Anna
comment.text: So funny how many people are falling for 'Russia helping Trump'. What look aid are you drinking from. Your proof of this craziness? Oh, I have a couple friends in law enforcement that worked for Hillary a couple weeks ago. She has such a foul mouth & hatred for police & military, that they couldn't stand it any longer and quit.

replies.author: Anna
replies.text: 'kool aid' above. Oh another thing, the media had been told, no positive news on Donald Trump or you will be fired

replies.author: Daniel
replies.text: Well you obviously fall in the "average voter is stupid" category. Your candidate says you are stupid and easy to manipulate! I guess u r both. And the proof has been all over MSM. That's the problem with democrats like you, you don't pay attention to news and what's going on, u just know u r voting for a woman who will give u free stuff, and you actually believe that as well. HER HACKED EMAILS TELL THE TRUTH AND YOU STILL SUPPORT HER!! R u that misguided and feel so low about yourself that u must vote for a woman who said YOU ARE STUPID AGAIN SHE SAID YOU ARE STUPID! Well I give her credit, she does admit the truth about her "easy manipulated" voters!

replies.author: Amber
replies.text: MSM Daniel? HAHAHAHA Proof? HAHAHA The truth is, Hillary hates America and Americans. She is so mentally damaged, and has been so closely groomed over the years by Huma, so corrupted by foreign actors giving her wads of cash, that she is not aware of just what is happening to her. Her speeches are terrible. The banks didn't give her all that cash just to hear her, and they probably talked about her like a dog after.
